title: President Zardari congratulates nation on successful test of Fatah-4 Missile
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 30 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Tuesday extended heartfelt congratulations to the nation on the successful test of the indigenously developed Fatah-4 missile, calling it a “milestone in Pakistan’s defense capabilities.”
In a statement issued by the Presidency, President Zardari praised the achievement as a testament to Pakistan’s growing self-reliance in science and technology. “The successful test of Fatah-4 is not just a technological breakthrough, but a clear demonstration of our scientific self-sufficiency,” he said.
President Zardari stated that the Fatah-4 would significantly strengthen Pakistan’s defence posture, ensuring the nation’s continued preparedness in the face of emerging regional and global threats.
The president also expressed deep appreciation for the scientists, engineers, and armed forces personnel who contributed to the development and testing of the missile. “The entire nation takes pride in the hard work, dedication, and unwavering commitment of our scientific and military communities,” he said.
President Zardari emphasized, “Pakistan’s defense is impregnable and it will remain so.”
